About

Welcome to Dr. Pineda's classroom. This website is intended for students in my math classes. Here you will find your course outlines, assessment information and class notes. During the semester this website is updated on a daily basis. It is your responsibility to stay up to date with the information posted here.

Contact

maythemathbewithyou.com

Math 30-2 (Block 5)

Have a great summer!
